page_not_found_description: Sorry, we couldn’t find the page you’re looking for.
search_through_cats: Search through several cats that are up for adoption
enter_your_email_to_reset: Enter email address to receive password reset link
preferences_desc: Define preferences for the type of cat you seek
discovery_desc: Look at several cats that fit your criteria
cat_card_desc: Look at the cat's profile to learn more about the cat
swipe_desc: Swipe right or heart a cat to chat with it's owner. Swipe left or reject a cat to see others
chat_desc: If the cat is right for you, arrange with the owner to take home your new furry friend!
profile_desc: Create a new profile for the cat you are finding a new home for
cat_details_desc: Add a description about the cat and any key details to it's profile
interest_desc: People will see the cat's profile and swipe right or heart it if they are interested
swipe_creates_chat_desc: A swipe right or heart will create a new chat between you and the interested party
chats_notifications_desc: Review your notifications and chats to stay updated on potential adopters
rehome_desc: Once you've found the right adopter, arrange for the cat to be taken to their new home!
password_minimum: Password must be at least 8 characters
password_maximum: Password must be at most 64 characters
password_format: Password must have at least 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter and 1 digit
privacy_policy_intro: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information when you use our website and services.
information_we_collect_desc: We may collect the following types of information:
personal_information_desc: such as your name, email address, and profile picture, especially when you log in using a third-party provider like Facebook or Google.
usage_data_desc: such as browser type, IP address, and pages visited on our site.
authenticate_users: Authenticate users via third-party providers (e.g., Facebook, Google)
respond_to_inquiries: Respond to inquiries and support requests
share_information_desc: We do not sell or rent your personal information. We may share data with third-party services only as necessary to operate our website (e.g., authentication, hosting).
facebook_login_desc: If you choose to log in using your Facebook account, we may receive basic profile information from Facebook, such as your name and email address. This data is used only to authenticate you and provide access to our services.
google_login_desc: If you choose to log in using your Google account, we may receive basic profile information from Google, such as your name and email address. This data is used only to authenticate you and provide access to our services.
data_retention_desc: We retain your personal data only as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations.
your_rights_desc: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. Contact us at
changes_to_policy_desc: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Updates will be posted on this page with the revised date.
contact_us_desc: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at
user_data_deletion_desc: In order to delete your data from our system, you can do so at any time by following the instructions below.
how_to_delete: How to Delete Your Account and Data
how_to_delete_desc: To delete your user account and all associated data:
log_in_account: Log in to your account on our website.
go_to_profile: Go to your user profile page.
once_deleted: Once confirmed, all of your personal data will be permanently deleted from our servers. This action cannot be undone.
need_help_desc: If you experience any issues or need assistance with deleting your data, please contact us at
verify_email: Please verify your email to log in.
get_user_profile_picture_error: Unable to retrieve user profile picture
update_user_profile_picture_error: Unable to update user profile picture
delete_user_profile_picture_error: Unable to delete user profile picture
invalid_date: Date of birth must be valid and before today
invalid_phone_number: Phone number must follow E.164 format or be empty
invalid_gender: Gender must be Man, Woman, or empty
max_image_size: Image can not be larger than
adopter_confirmation_title: Are you sure you want to become an adopter?
adopter_confirmation_desc: All of your listings will be deleted and you will have to create new ones if you become a rehomer again in the future
rehomer_confirmation_title: Are you sure you want to become a rehomer?
rehomer_confirmation_desc: Your chats with rehomers and history of selected cats will be deleted
internal_server_error_desc: We are currently trying to fix the problem.
get_user_profile_picture_and_type_error: Unable to retrieve user picture and type
reset_password_link_dialog_title: We'll send a password reset link to your email
email_sent: Email sent. Click the link in the email to reset your password
invalid_min_age: Minimum age in months must be at 0 or older
invalid_max_age: Maximum age in months must be 480 or younger
invalid_max_distance: Max distance must be between 1 and 250
no_cat_listings_desc: You haven't added any cats to your listings yet. Start by adding your first cat to find them a loving forever home.
neutered_modal_desc: Only show cats that are neutered or spayed
location_field_placeholder: Enter a place, address or zip code
geolocation_not_supported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser
geolocation_permission_denied: Location permission denied. Please enable location services in your browser settings.
geolocation_error: An error occurred while getting your location
add_animal_desc: Fill out the form below to list a cat for adoption
cat_photos_desc: Upload up to 5 photos of the cat. At least 1 photo is required. You can drag and drop or click to browse.
upload_photos: Click or drag to upload photos
photo_upload_rules: PNG, JPG, GIF up to 5MB each
description_placeholder: Tell potential adopters about the cat's personality, habits, health, etc.
location_tooltip: The address will not be visible to others. Potential adopters will only see how far away the cat is.
address_desc: Select an address from the suggestions to ensure proper formatting
tip_1: Use clear, well-lit photos that show the cat's face and body
tip_3: Be honest about the cat's personality and any special needs
tip_4: Respond promptly to inquiries from potential adopters
invalid_photos: One or more photos are invalid. Please check file type and size.
compression_failed_large_photo: Unable to compress photo. Please select a smaller image (under 1MB).
delete_animal_dialog_content_1: Are you sure you want to delete
delete_animal_dialog_content_2: from your listings? This action cannot be undone.
deleting_animal_2: This will take just a moment
rehomer_dashboard_error_tip_login: Make sure you're logged in to your account
rehomer_dashboard_error_tip_retry: Try again in a few moments - the server might be temporarily unavailable
rehomer_dashboard_error_tip_database_loa: There might be an issue with the database connection
rehomer_dashboard_error_tip_data_corrupt: Your cat listings data might be corrupted or invalid
rehomer_dashboard_error_tip_already_dele: The cat listing may have already been deleted
rehomer_dashboard_error_tip_storage: There might be an issue with the storage system for cat photos
rehomer_dashboard_error_tip_transaction: The database transaction might have failed
animal_name_max_length: Cat name must be at most 200 characters
animal_age_whole: Age must be a whole number
animal_age_positive: Age must be a positive number
animal_age_max: Age must be 1920 weeks or less
animal_desc_max: Description must be 1000 characters or less
edit_animal_desc: Update the information about your cat listing
edit_cat_photos_desc: Upload new photos to replace existing ones. All photos will be replaced when you upload new ones.
existing_photos_note: These photos will be replaced if you upload new photos
edit_form_fields_note: Only fill in the fields you want to update
no_changes_detected: No changes detected. Please make changes before submitting.
animal_listing_load_error_desc: We couldn't load the cat listing. Please try again or return to your dashboard.
upload_new_photos: Click or drag to upload new photos
discovery_search_help: Try adjusting your search criteria to find more cats.
search_location_desc: This will be used as the central point for searching cats within your specified distance.
error_loading_cats_desc: We're having trouble loading cats right now. This might be a temporary issue.
error_tip_retry: Try again in a few minutes
cat_not_found_desc: The cat you're looking for doesn't exist or has been adopted.
message_sent_desc: Check your inbox to monitor your conversation with this cat's owner.
adoption_tip_1: Prepare your home with essential supplies before bringing {{name}} home.
adoption_tip_2: Schedule a vet visit within the first week of adoption.
adoption_tip_3: Be patient as {{name}} adjusts to their new environment.
message_placeholder: Hi! I'm interested in adopting {{name}}. Could you tell me more about them?
message_will_be_sent: Your message will be sent to the cat's owner
